items.name: Ronin
items.smallText: A modern landing page for a design agency, featuring a sleek design and smooth animations.
items.bigText:
Ronin is a modern landing page for a design agency, built with React, Next.js, and SCSS. The project showcases my ability to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces, enhancing the user experience.

The site features a dynamic hero section, services section, FAQ section, and an about section, all meticulously designed for seamless user engagement. The use of SCSS ensures a consistent and visually appealing design, while the integration of Framer Motion adds subtle yet engaging animations.

This project is a testament to my web development skills and passion for creating appealing web experiences.

items.name: Esep
items.smallText: A govermental platform for traking and managing reports
items.bigText:
A govermental platform from the company called DGSC used for traking and managing goverment reports.

Reports are structured in form of tables, there are respondents and admins. Admin are able to use uniquely created report constractor and assign reports to certain respondents. While respondents are able to fill in the relevant statistics and send them. Also on the platfrom reports are able to be aggregated, to allow to see data by for example regions or fileds.

Project was crafted with Node.js, MySQL, ClickHouse, and on frontend were used Typescript, React, Redux and SCSS.
